English: Waiting for host to decide what's next...
Description: A text that is shown for clients in the expedition failed/success screen, to indicate that it is up to the host to take action (return to lobby or restart from checkpoint).

French.Translation: En attente de la décision de l'hôte...

Italian.Translation: In attesa che l'host decida il prossimo passo...

German.Translation: Auf den Host warten, der entscheidet, was als Nächstes zu tun ist ...

Spanish.Translation: Esperando a que el anfitrión decida qué hacer...

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Aguardando o anfitrião decidir os próximos passos...

Japanese.Translation: ホストの次の判断を待っています...

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 正在等待厅主做出决定……

name: ExpeditionFailPage.WaitForHostButton
